Bibliographic References: PAdd, no. A 293, pi. 7 d; ArchReps 1955, p. 57; Sestieri, Dioniso 22, 1959, p. 43, fig. 2; EAA vi, p. 93, fig. 107; LIMC III, p. 712, Elektra I 22, pi, 545, 2
Imagery Description: The meeting of Orestes and Electra with Pylades at the tomb; woman coming up with wreath; woman with phiale approaching seated woman with wreath and fillet. The several groups are separated by palmettes with florals.
Artist: The Painter of Naples 2585 and his circle
